DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this trial is to determine the efficacy and safety of A3384 administered to patients with Bile Acid Malabsorption (BAM)/Bile Acid Diarrhoea (BAD).
DOC.brief_title: Double-blind, Randomised Study of A3384 in BAM/BAD
